issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:

Found 15 items

Workaround:
 
ALTER TABLE  .. SET  TBLPROPERTIES ('compactorthreshold.hive.compactor.delta.num.threshold'='1')   - and wait done compactors working
 
OR 
 
set hive.execution.engine=mr;
 
Question :
 
exist any other workaround for run select with TEZ  ?
fields.summary: Hive2 select with group by error  if transactional = true

comments.body: Also problem resolved  after  set hive.tez.input.format=org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.io.HiveInputFormat;  <<<  works with TEZ
